T_oJG6YyTYsWxziqS.name: Select level of night vision
T_oJG6YyTYsWxziqS.notes: 4 is fairly realistic, 9 is perfect, or use infravision

T8RKUB2W6n4xlgQB9.name: Pick a role for Goblins in society

tGQ3kZVGDPeRSn6Bs.name: Greed
tGQ3kZVGDPeRSn6Bs.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

toQ6OEwD885owe5XX.name: Miserliness
toQ6OEwD885owe5XX.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

tJz_zJ42aRZDhtH5C.name: Obsession
tJz_zJ42aRZDhtH5C.notes: Achieve perfection in chosen profession; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

t0YdPeJQ6hUNUSXvq.name: Impulsiveness
t0YdPeJQ6hUNUSXvq.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

tzjEWidcEMqC1L7Ml.name: Selfish
tzjEWidcEMqC1L7Ml.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

tgrKT83v8K3Ax6o6s.name: Impulsiveness
tgrKT83v8K3Ax6o6s.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

ts8wFI82dnPF0PypO.name: Impulsiveness
ts8wFI82dnPF0PypO.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

tyJNfUOBZQvaZHQUO.name: Sadism
tyJNfUOBZQvaZHQUO.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.

features.situation: from those who become aware of your Sadism unless they are from a culture that holds life in little esteem

tXSBWXQB63gK9CYg0.name: Trickster
tXSBWXQB63gK9CYg0.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

tmtHVUcYYl3OgHF5X.name: Impulsiveness
tmtHVUcYYl3OgHF5X.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

thK92YL9gBzTijI2b.name: Likes to hang around with wizards

tRf81Lgulxtk3rW0e.name: Curious
tRf81Lgulxtk3rW0e.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

tvI5ePMrSRkmRkje8.name: Imitative
tvI5ePMrSRkmRkje8.notes: Will habitually emulate other beings after spending a little time with them
